job.title: Helpdesk Engineer
job.description: strongHELPDESK ENGINEERstrongbrbr brbrPrescient Solutions is an awardwinning Chicagolandbased IT outsourcer For more than 25 years we have been providing CIOlevel advisory support and onsite IT services to small midsized and global organizations and government entities We are committed to making our clientsapos businesses run better by adding more value to their organizations through technology If you are looking for an opportunity to join a team where you can drive your career while being part of a company that values the ability to learn and grow this is your chance Prescient Solutions offers a great work environment that encourages teamwork to achieve a greater purpose while providing a higher level of service through better communicationbrbr brbrWe are looking for a dynamic Helpdesk  Help Desk Engineer who shares our commitment and believes in the value of communication and client interaction As a Helpdesk  Help Desk Engineer you will provide Level 1 and Level 2 support in a primarily Microsoft environment onsite at at a client accountbrbr brbrbrstrongESSENTIAL DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIESstrongbrbrbr brbrulbr	liResponsible for hardware and software maintenance upgrades computer roll outslibr	liCreates and maintains new user accounts have knowledge of Active Directory structurelibr	liWorks closely with Network and Systems Engineers to gain knowledge of network topology profiles and tasks within a Windowsbased back end environmentlibr	liDocuments and posts procedures to the SharePoint portal used as a tool to educate fellow team members and enhance our knowledgebaselibr	liContributes to the planning and design of workstation hardware software and application capabilitieslibr	liInterfaces with other Information Technology groups to coordinate projectslibr	liWorks with our clients to make decisions on desktop and laptop purchases setup images andbrbr	deploymenttesting issueslibr	liResearches options for long and shortterm changes to the desktop computer technologies in order to ensure that required functions are available to support business initiative across the client organizationlibr	liEvaluates emerging technologieslibr	liDelivers assigned projects while meeting assigned time lines and budget objectives andlibr	liPerforms other duties andor assists with special projects as neededlibrulbrbr brbrbrCOMPETENCIESbrbrbr brbrulbr	liMinimum of two years of IT related customer service experience in a helpdesk or call center settinglibr	liAn excellent verbal and written communicatorlibr	liTeam player with the ability to take ownership of an area following assigned tasks through to successful completionlibr	liTechnical knowledge of AntiVirus software Office 365 Citrix printers and peripheralslibr	liAdvanced understanding of desktop and laptop OSs general applications and troubleshootinglibr	liGreat technical writing skills Process and howto docslibr	liSolid understanding of TCPIP and communications protocolslibr	liBasic understanding of servers and networkslibr	liAbility to work on multiple taskslibr	liCommitment to Client service excellence andlibr	liCreative problemsolving skillsliul
